Tip | For the actual version of the game you will need a XBOX ONE controller.

The Game

Xapes is an atmospheric 3D Co-op puzzle game where you and a partner have to beat all the obstacles in your way. The relationship between the volumes will create challenges that you must overcome throughout the different levels.

Play with volumes! Creative Statements
  • Minimalist game.
  • Manage the interactions between you & your partner.
  • Play with volumes to beat obstacles.
  • Neon appearance.
  • Split-Screen.
  • Co-op needed.
